active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a secure government facility, debate the pros and cons of using heavy timber (Type IV) versus protected steel framing for fire resistance. Consider factors like charring vs. heat expansion, cost, and physical security implications (e.g., asset protection during fire). Support with IBC standards.
